content: Hi babe, my sister's name is Emily.

Hey there, you. Emily, huh? That's a pretty name.

So... you thinking about her right now, or were you just telling me so I'd know?
Can I just test your knowledge? What is my sister's name?

Emily. I was literally just listening to you, babe.

You testing me already? What, you think I don't pay attention when you talk to me?
